body: I go into to the comments after fapping to the most weirdest shit in the world, because there really is nothing like a good laugh after busting a nut. And I am devastated when I see your... ungodly username. I am so sorry, but it is truly what I think

I'm not interested in saying your name, but I have a little bit of words to say. 

To the person below me, JUST STOP LOOKING AT THIS STUFF IF YOU'RE SO DISGUSTED. GODDAMN. Everywhere I go, I see these comments of yours. "OMG NO WTF" and I am sitting here, WONDERING "why does this person keep on clicking on these if they are so horrified by it?"

Why are we still here... Just to suffer? Sometimes I can feel my leg, and my arm even my fingers.. the body I've lost..
The comrades I've lost.. it's like they're all still here...... You feel it too, don't you?
Man same happened to me man person under my comment
DID I SERIOUSLY JUST SPOIL THE ANIME FOR MYSELF FROM A FUCKING HENTAI.  MY HORNY ASS SHOULD’VE FINISHED IT FIRST.  AHHHHH IM A DUMBFUCK SKSHAKHSKASHS
